forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High 2C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Some clouds this morning will give way to generally sunny skies for the afternoon. High 36F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly clear. Low -7C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few passing clouds, otherwise generally clear. Low 19F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Intervals of clouds and sunshine in the morning with more clouds for later in the day. High 2C. Winds E at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine in the morning with more clouds for later in the day. High 36F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy. Low -6C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy during the evening. A few snow showers developing late. Low 22F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 30%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Scattered snow showers during the morning. Then partly to mostly cloudy for the afternoon. High near 5C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy with scattered snow and rain showers. High 41F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Watching a potential winter storm. Snow likely. Low -2C. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 100%. 7-12cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Watching a potential winter storm. Cloudy with rain and snow in the evening, becoming all snow late. Low 28F. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 100%. 1 to 3 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Watching a potential winter storm. Snow likely. High -1C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 90%. 3-7cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Watching a potential winter storm. Snow during the morning will give way to lingering snow showers during the afternoon. High near 30F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 90%. 1 to 3 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. Low -8C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Occasional snow showers. Low 18F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 50%. About one inch of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. A few flurries or snow showers possible. High -2C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. A few flurries or snow showers possible. High 29F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow likely. Low -6C. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulating 3-7cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow likely. Low 21F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 80%. Snow accumulating 1 to 3 inches.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with snow showers early and steady snow likely later in the day. High -1C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 80%. 3-7cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of snow. High near 30F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 80%. 3 to 5 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow likely. Low -6C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 80%. 12-20cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow likely. Low 21F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 80%. 5 to 8 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of snow. High -3C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 70%. 7-12cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of snow. High 26F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 70%. 3 to 5 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow showers before midnight. Becoming partly cloudy later. Low -7C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow showers early. Breaks in the overcast later. Low 19F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 40%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies in the morning will give way to cloudy skies during the afternoon. High -1C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Some sun in the morning with increasing clouds during the afternoon. High 31F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Occasional snow showers. Low around -5C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 40%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Variably cloudy with snow showers. Low 23F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 40%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow showers. High near 0C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 50%. Snow accumulating 3-7cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Variable clouds with snow showers. High 32F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 50%. 1 to 3 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Variably cloudy with snow showers. Low -4C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 50%. Snowfall of 2-3cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow showers. Low around 25F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 50%. Snow accumulating 1 to 3 inches.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow showers in the morning will give way to a mixture of rain and snow in the afternoon. High 1C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 40%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Occasional snow showers. High 33F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 50%. About one inch of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Occasional snow showers. Low -4C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 40%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Occasional snow showers. Low 24F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 40%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.
